column4: Hi folks, I'm using Lucid. I've installed, uninstalled and reinstalled a couple of applications a number of times, and they now no longer appear in my GNOME Applications menu. I've looked in /usr/share/applications, and they don't show up here either. Can anyone help?
most applications for users have their binaries located in /usr/bin or /usr/share/bin
Aye, but the menu items are sourced from /usr/share/applications - it's curious the packages aren't putting the appname.desktop file in there
